alert.note: Alert for Dubois; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 02 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT EDT SATURDAY NIGHT... The officials at the Indiana Department of Environmental Management Continue the Ozone Action Day for today, and have also called for an Ozone action day for Saturday June 3rd for the following counties... Dubois Perry Orange Crawford Here are some recommended actions that the public can take to reduce ozone forming emissions: * Walk, bike, carpool or use public transportation. * Avoid using the drive-through and combine errands into one trip. * Avoid refueling your vehicle or using gasoline-powered lawn equipment until after 7 PM. * Turn off your engine when idling for more than 30 seconds. * Conserve energy by turning off lights or setting the air conditioner to 75 degrees or above.
